Package sbw.architecture.bus.protocol

Class RequestTerminate

java.lang.Object
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.A_Request
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.A_RequestFollowup
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.RequestTerminate
public class RequestTerminate extends A_RequestFollowup
Defines a request to cancel an existing request on a servicer by shutting it down gracefully and canceling it as soon as possible.
